items.title: Add mainEntityOfPage property for SEO
items.description: Introduced support for the 'mainEntityOfPage' property to improve SEO and metadata handling for articles.

items.title: Fix AI global settings initialization bug
items.description: Resolved issue where Labrador AI global settings could be initialized as null, ensuring stable startup for AI features.

items.title: Support American date format in admin
items.description: Added the option to use American date formatting in administrative views, making date handling clearer for US-based users.

items.title: Improve skyscraper ad reloading logic
items.description: Enhanced logic to prevent frequent reloading of skyscraper ads, resulting in fewer visual disruptions for readers.

items.title: Fix expandable menus
items.description: Fixed the expandable menu functionality so navigation behaves correctly for all site visitors.

items.title: Allow custom link attributes in config
items.description: Admins may now define custom link attributes in configuration, enabling more flexible link behavior in views.

items.title: Sesamy: Default type from admin select
items.description: Admin selection forms now properly default to the correct type, improving data entry reliability.

items.title: Improve Vimond integration
items.description: Enhanced integration with Vimond video services to offer smoother playback and better compatibility for editors.

items.title: Add additional search button
items.description: Users can now trigger searches with an additional button using the header config.

items.title: Allow filtered data in custom tags
items.description: Moved the export logic for customtags to let the template read filtered data. Example: `{{{ get.current.filtered.staticUrl }}}`

items.title: Add VP player support
items.description: Enabled VP player integration for video content, allowing editors to embed and control videos more easily.

items.title: Show menu name option
items.description: Added option to display menu names in the navigation, providing clearer structure for editors and readers.

items.title: Change YouTube embed to no-cookie domain
items.description: YouTube videos now use the privacy-friendly youtube-nocookie.com domain for embeds, reducing tracking of site visitors.

items.title: Dashboard: Add date picker for external search
items.description: Implemented a date picker in external search, improving usability when searching for articles by date.

items.title: Add font style support to search component
items.description: Editors can now choose font styles in the search component, helping improve the appearance and readability of search results in Labrador CMS.

items.title: Customize Labrador search results
items.description: Search results in Labrador CMS are now customizable, allowing editors to tailor the appearance and data shown to better fit their workflow or site requirements.

items.title: Fix padding and background for teaser images
items.description: Improves the appearance of teaser images with rounded corners and background color, and also corrects padding in quoteboxes for a cleaner look in the CMS.

items.title: Iteras paywall: Update header style on login and logout
items.description: Header styling now changes automatically when users log in or out using Iteras, providing visual feedback and better UI experience.

items.title: Add feed filtering to automatic articles
items.description: Adds the ability to filter feeds by name, key, or URL in the automatic articles collection, making it easier to find and manage content sources.

items.title: Add configurable noscript template for paywall
items.description: Introduces a template for a noscript meta tag that can be controlled by the paywall admin, improving flexibility in paywall setup.
